thread.section_title: Bettoja Atlantico Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable with great value
thread.title_full: Comfortable with great value - Review of Bettoja Atlantico Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Chilenz
title: Comfortable with great value
text:
I stayed here for a total of 4 nights. I was pleasantly surprised by everything about the hotel. The service was great. Albert at the front desk really took care of us. Every other staff I encountered was also fantastic.
The buffet breakfast was delicious. There was a decent variety of foods to choose from including Gluten Free bread.
The decor is a bit outdated, and that would probably be my only negative feedback. Otherwise, it was a very comfortable stay in the rooms.
